title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo—get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers—chat, stream, and list local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat history, multi-model, PDF upload, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, model switching, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots with autocomplete and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama—sync/async APIs, streaming, and embedding utilities.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama—chat, embed, and manage models idiomatically.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-camel
summary: CAMEL-AI wrapper that adds autonomous agent tooling on top of Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Curated collection of Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Open-WebUI, and more.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama—supports chat, streaming, and embeddings.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with local models.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that exposes Ollama as injectable services with Swagger docs.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app providing admin-configurable Ollama models and chat endpoints.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models via DMs and channels.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note writing using Ollama models offline.
